Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.ControllerClasses

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Observer<T>
    Observer Interface contains a method to be called by an Observable when a new event occurs.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActionController
    ActionController Class contains all that is needed to compute an Action sent by the Client and to create a MessageToClient message containing a response.
    Controller
    Controller Class observes messages coming from the Client to compute them as soon as they are notified by a serverConnection object (which extends Observable).
    Observable<T>
    Observable Class defines functionality and methods needed for a Class to be observed by a number of Observers.
